name: punkshot
story:
Punk Shot was produced by Konami in 1990.

Two-on-two ghetto basketball game for one to four people. Players can pass or shoot when they have the ball, or punch and kick when the opposition does. Various obstacles (manholes, etc.) also add to gameplay.

There are two teams in the game: The Ramblers and The Slammers. Each team has two different characters: for The Ramblers, Basher and Stallion; and for The Slammers, Hair and Spike.
At the beginning of game, players can select one of four different places to play: a park, a docking pier, a vacant lot or an alleyway.

The game play is similar to Arch Rivals.
